title: Authorization
text: The bank must get an authorization from the customer for debiting the funds via an online form or a signed document.

title: Gathering information
text: The payee (getting the funds) must gather all the information such as routing numbers and transfer codes along with the account number to submit it for the transaction

title: Processing
text: The payee processes the transfer using a payment gateway.

title: Initiation and Verification
text: The bank initiates the process of payment confirming the processing time and obtaining the necessary verification from the respective banks of the payer and the payee.

title: Transfer of Funds and Confirmation
text: The bank completes the transfer and sends a confirmation receipt to the payer and the payee by email or message.
